relation: Well, I wasn't able to participate in after school activities due too my work schedule. If I was able too I would have been apart of Fashion Club
There is no dorm life, I wish they had dorms
Nothing in the life is easy and neither us work at MCC. work hard and stay focus and you will do fine.
spend as much time as possible in the library. Don't rush take your time, we all move at differently. Find a advisor that you like and stick with it .

I think that Middlesex is a great school with professor who are there too help student. I have had good time and bad at MCC but its what you make it. I learn a lot of academic material but I also learned who I am .
pageTitle: Middlesex County College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Jo-Sette from Piscataway, NJ 12/27/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 45 Categories Comments Campus Safety The campus is very safe. I go to school at various times of the evening and school saftey drives around often. Most people are going about their own business. I am very petite and I feel completely safe at Middlesex County College. Great for these types of students It is great for all students; Non-traditional and traditional alike; with various ethnicities you will never feel left out. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus none Bang for the buck I personally use all the school has to offer. When I have to print out my paper, I bring my flash drive to their center and print out my documents. I use their computers and libraries when on campus instead of going to my local library. I go to tutoring anytime I need
